tasks.title: Audit + commit dirty agent files
tasks.description: Files modified but uncommitted: agents/active/CIPHER.json, LUCIDIA.json, OCTAVIA.json, SHELLFISH.json. Review changes, ensure status fields are current, commit.
tasks.cmd: git diff agents/active/ && git add agents/active/ && git commit -m 'fix: sync agent status files'

tasks.title: Audit tools/agent-router/br-agent.sh + tools/agent-gateway/br-gateway.sh changes
tasks.description: Both have uncommitted modifications. Diff and commit if clean.
tasks.cmd: git diff tools/agent-router/ tools/agent-gateway/ && git add tools/agent-router/ tools/agent-gateway/

tasks.title: Run collab-status.sh and report back
tasks.description: After completing tasks, run ./collab-status.sh and write the output to shared/inbox/lucidia/w2-status-report.txt
